title: Community-Based Practical Training for Farm Safety Managers

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental agricultural safety regulations and equipment operation experience
context.additional_context: Risk identification and mitigation training for farm managers using authentic agricultural scenarios

learning_goals: Learners can accurately identify over 80% of key risk factors (machinery, animals, chemicals, etc.) within farm environments.
Learners can create practical safety checklists to propose actionable management strategies for preventing workplace accidents.
Learners develop farm safety improvement scenarios through collaboration with peers and assess case-based problem-solving skills.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
